trans-unit.source: This is done by checking if $route and $params match that specified in the url option of the menu item. When the url option of a menu item is specified in terms of an array, its first element is treated as the route for the item and the rest of the elements are the associated parameters. Only when its route and parameters match $route and $params, respectively, will a menu item be considered active.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to set the isolation level while the transaction is already active. However this is not supported by all DBMS so you might rather specify the isolation level directly when calling begin().
trans-unit.target: 事务已经处于活动状态时，可以使用此方法来设置隔离级别。但是，并非所有DBMS都支持此功能，因此您可能宁愿在调用begin（）时直接指定隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: This method can invoked several times before complete() is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用complete（）之前，可以多次调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be invoked at the beginning of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只能在构造函数开始时被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up all cached index schemas so that they can be re-created later to reflect the Sphinx schema change.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以清理所有缓存的索引模式,这样它们就可以在以后重新创建以反映Sphinx模式的变化。

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up all cached table schemas so that they can be re-created later to reflect the database schema change.
trans-unit.target: 此方法清理所有缓存的表模式,以便以后可以重新创建以反映数据库模式的变化。

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up cached table schema so that it can be re-created later to reflect the database schema change.
trans-unit.target: 此方法清理缓存的表模式,以便以后可以重新创建以反映数据库模式的变化。

trans-unit.source: This method contains the logic to be executed when applying this migration.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法包含了应用这个迁移时要执行的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: This method contains the logic to be executed when removing this migration.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法包含了删除这个迁移时要执行的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the result getInputName() into a valid input ID. For example, if getInputName() returns Post[content], this method will return post-content.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将结果getInputName（）转换为有效的输入ID。例如，如果getInputName（）返回 Post[content] ，则此方法将返回 post-content 。

trans-unit.source: This method could be overridden by child classes to define available attributes. Note: all attributes defined in base Active Record class should be always present in returned array. For example:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以被子类重载来定义可用的属性。注意:所有在基础Active Record类中定义的属性应该始终存在于返回的数组中。例如

trans-unit.source: This method creates an instance of the calling class setting the MODE_BEGIN mode. Any item between begin() and end() which match the filter attribute, will be selectable. It will apply the configuration to the created instance. A matching end() call should be called later. As some widgets may use output buffering, the end() call should be made in the same view to avoid breaking the nesting of output buffers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建设置MODE_BEGIN模式的调用类的实例。在begin（）和end（）之间与filter属性匹配的任何项目都是可以选择的。它将配置应用于创建的实例。匹配的end（）调用应稍后调用。由于某些小部件可能使用输出缓冲，因此应该在同一视图中进行end（）调用，以避免破坏输出缓冲区的嵌套。

trans-unit.source: This method creates an instance of the calling class. It will apply the configuration to the created instance. A matching end() call should be called later. As some widgets may use output buffering, the end() call should be made in the same view to avoid breaking the nesting of output buffers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建调用类的实例。它将配置应用于创建的实例。匹配的end（）调用应稍后调用。由于某些小部件可能使用输出缓冲，因此应该在同一视图中进行end（）调用，以避免破坏输出缓冲区的嵌套。

trans-unit.source: This method defines the attribute that uniquely identifies a record.
trans-unit.target: 此方法定义了唯一标识记录的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method differs from render() in that it does not apply any layout.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与render（）的不同之处在于它不应用任何布局。

trans-unit.source: This method differs from getActiveValidators() in that the latter only returns the validators applicable to the current $scenario.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与getActiveValidators（）的不同之处在于，后者仅返回适用于当前$ scenario的验证器。

trans-unit.source: This method differs from with() in that it will build up and execute a JOIN SQL statement for the primary table. And when $eagerLoading is true, it will call with() in addition with the specified relations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与with（）的不同之处在于它将为主表建立并执行JOIN SQL语句。当 $eagerLoading 为true时，除了指定的关系外，它还将调用with（）。

trans-unit.source: This method differs from down() in that the DB logic implemented here will be enclosed within a DB transaction. Child classes may implement this method instead of down() if the DB logic needs to be within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与down（）的不同之处在于，此处实现的数据库逻辑将包含在数据库事务中。如果DB逻辑需要在事务中，则子类可以实现此方法，而不是down（）。

trans-unit.source: This method differs from up() in that the DB logic implemented here will be enclosed within a DB transaction. Child classes may implement this method instead of up() if the DB logic needs to be within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与up（）的不同之处在于，此处实现的数据库逻辑将包含在数据库事务中。如果DB逻辑需要在事务内，则子类可以实现此方法而不是up（）。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the view requested by the user.
trans-unit.target: 此方法显示用户所要求的视图。

trans-unit.source: This method does not perform any publishing. It merely tells you if the file or directory is published, where it will go.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法不执行任何发布。它只是告诉你,如果文件或目录被发布,它将去哪里。

trans-unit.source: This method does not perform any publishing. It merely tells you if the file path is published, what the URL will be to access it.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法不执行任何发布。它只是告诉你,如果文件路径被发布,访问它的URL将是什么。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing in this class.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法在这个类中没有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This method does the same as the PHP function in_array() but additionally works for objects that implement the Traversable interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与PHP函数in_array（）相同，但还适用于实现Traversable接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method does the same as the PHP function is_array() but additionally works on objects that implement the Traversable interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与PHP函数is_array（）相同，但还可以对实现Traversable接口的对象起作用。

trans-unit.source: This method does the same as the PHP function in_array() but additionally works for objects that implement the Traversable interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与PHP函数in_array（）相同，但还适用于实现Traversable接口的对象。

trans-unit.target: 此方法与PHP函数is_array（）相同，但还可以对实现Traversable接口的对象起作用。

trans-unit.source: This method enhances the array_key_exists() function by supporting case-insensitive key comparison.
trans-unit.target: 通过支持不区分大小写的键比较，此方法增强了 array_key_exists() 函数。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures the string is treated as a byte array by using mb_strlen().
trans-unit.target: 此方法确保使用 mb_strlen() 将字符串视为字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures the string is treated as a byte array by using mb_substr().
trans-unit.target: 此方法确保使用 mb_substr() 将字符串视为字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This method executes the specified SQL statement using $db.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用$ db执行指定的SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: This method executes the validation rules applicable to the current $scenario. The following criteria are used to determine whether a rule is currently applicable:
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行适用于当前$ scenario的验证规则。以下条件用于确定规则当前是否适用：

trans-unit.source: This method generates a name that can be used as the input name to collect user input for the specified attribute. The name is generated according to the form name of the model and the given attribute name. For example, if the form name of the Post model is Post, then the input name generated for the content attribute would be Post[content].
trans-unit.target: 此方法生成一个名称，该名称可用作输入名称，以收集指定属性的用户输入。该名称是根据模型的表单名称和给定的属性名称生成的。例如，如果 Post 模型的表单名称是 Post ，那么为 content 属性生成的输入名称将是 Post[content] 。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect in Elasticsearch ActiveRecord.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法在Elasticsearch ActiveRecord中没有效果。

trans-unit.target: 当会话不活动时，此方法无效。确保在调用open（）之前先调用它。

trans-unit.source: This method implements the load balancing among the given list of the servers. Connections will be tried in random order.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法实现了在给定的服务器列表中的负载均衡。连接将以随机顺序被尝试。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked right after the DB connection is established. The default implementation turns on PDO::ATTR_EMULATE_PREPARES if $emulatePrepare is true, and sets the database $charset if it is not empty. It then triggers an EVENT_AFTER_OPEN event.
trans-unit.target: 建立数据库连接后立即调用此方法。如果$ emulatePrepare为true，则默认实现打开 PDO::ATTR_EMULATE_PREPARES 如果数据库不为空，则设置数据库$ charset。然后，它将触发EVENT_AFTER_OPEN事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is mainly used to collect tabular data input. The data to be loaded for each model is $data[formName][index], where formName refers to the value of formName(), and index the index of the model in the $models array. If formName() is empty, $data[index] will be used to populate each model. The data being populated to each model is subject to the safety check by setAttributes().
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要用于收集表格数据输入。要加载每个模型的数据是 $data[formName][index] ，其中 formName 指的值表格名称（） ，和 index 中相应的模型的索引 $models 阵列。如果formName（）为空，则将使用 $data[index] 填充每个模型。填充到每个模型的数据将通过setAttributes（）进行安全检查。

trans-unit.source: This method is mainly used together with content caching (fragment caching and page caching) when some portions of the content (called dynamic content) should not be cached. The dynamic content must be returned by some PHP statements.
trans-unit.target: 当不应缓存部分内容（称为动态内容）时，此方法主要与内容缓存（片段缓存和页面缓存）一起使用。动态内容必须由某些PHP语句返回。

trans-unit.source: This method is not designed for content compression (you should use gzip output compression to achieve it). Main intention is to strip out extra whitespace characters between HTML tags in order to avoid browser rendering quirks in some circumstances (e.g. newlines between inline-block elements).
trans-unit.target: 此方法不是设计用于内容压缩的（您应该使用 gzip 输出压缩来实现它）。主要目的是在HTML标记之间去除多余的空格字符，以避免在某些情况下（例如，内联块元素之间的换行符）浏览器呈现古怪的现象。

trans-unit.source: This method is required by the SPL Countable interface. It will be implicitly called when you use count($collection).
trans-unit.target: SPL Countable 接口需要此方法。使用 count($collection) 时将隐式调用它。

trans-unit.source: This method is required by the SPL interface ArrayAccess. It is implicitly called when you use something like $collection[$name] = $cookie;. This is equivalent to add().

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to fields() except that the list of fields declared by this method are not returned by default by toArray(). Only when a field in the list is explicitly requested, will it be included in the result of toArray().
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于fields（），不同之处在于，默认情况下，toArray（）不会返回此方法声明的字段列表。仅当显式请求列表中的字段时，才会将其包含在toArray（）的结果中。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to fields() except that the list of fields returned by this method are not returned by default by toArray(). Only when field names to be expanded are explicitly specified when calling toArray(), will their values be exported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于fields（），不同之处在于，默认情况下，toArray（）不返回此方法返回的字段列表。只有在调用toArray（）时显式指定要扩展的字段名称时，才会导出其值。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to renderPartial() except that it will inject into the rendering result with JS/CSS scripts and files which are registered with the view. For this reason, you should use this method instead of renderPartial() to render a view to respond to an AJAX request.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与renderPartial（）相似，不同之处在于它将使用带有在视图中注册的JS / CSS脚本和文件注入呈现结果。因此，您应该使用此方法而不是renderPartial（）来渲染视图以响应AJAX请求。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to render() except that it will surround the view being rendered with the calls of beginPage(), head(), beginBody(), endBody() and endPage(). By doing so, the method is able to inject into the rendering result with JS/CSS scripts and files that are registered with the view.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与render（）相似，不同之处在于它将用beginPage（），head（），beginBody（），endBody（）和endPage（）的调用包围正在渲染的视图。这样，该方法就可以将JS / CSS脚本和在视图中注册的文件注入渲染结果中。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to fields() except that the list of fields returned by this method are not returned by default by toArray(). Only when field names to be expanded are explicitly specified when calling toArray(), will their values be exported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于fields（），不同之处在于，默认情况下，toArray（）不返回此方法返回的字段列表。只有在调用toArray（）时显式指定要扩展的字段名称时，才会导出其值。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to andHaving(). The main difference is that this method will remove empty query operands. As a result, this method is best suited for building query conditions based on filter values entered by users.

trans-unit.target: 此方法与set（）相似，不同之处在于通过此方法注册的类将只有一个实例。每次调用get（）时，将返回指定类的相同实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to dirname() except that it will treat both \ and / as directory separators, independent of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 dirname() ,不同之处在于它将\和/都视为目录分隔符，而与操作系统无关。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to var_export(). The main difference is that it generates more compact string representation using short array syntax.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 var_export() 。主要区别在于它使用短数组语法生成更紧凑的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the PHP mkdir() function except that it uses chmod() to set the permission of the created directory in order to avoid the impact of the umask setting.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与PHP mkdir() 函数相似，不同之处在于它使用 chmod() 设置创建目录的权限，以避免 umask 设置的影响。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the php function basename() except that it will treat both \ and / as directory separators, independent of the operating system. This method was mainly created to work on php namespaces. When working with real file paths, php's basename() should work fine for you. Note: this method is not aware of the actual filesystem, or path components such as "..".
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于php函数 basename() ,不同之处在于它将\和/都视为目录分隔符，而与操作系统无关。此方法主要是为了在php名称空间上工作而创建的。当使用实际文件路径时，php的 basename() 应该可以正常工作。注意：此方法不知道实际的文件系统或路径组件，例如“ ..”。

trans-unit.source: This method parses the specified route and creates the corresponding child module(s), controller and action instances. It then calls yii\base\Controller::runAction() to run the action with the given parameters. If the route is empty, the method will use $defaultRoute.

trans-unit.source: This method parses the specified route and creates the corresponding child module(s), controller and action instances. It then calls yii\console\Controller::runAction() to run the action with the given parameters. If the route is empty, the method will use $defaultRoute.

trans-unit.source: This method performs the following steps in order:

trans-unit.source: This method prepends the URL created by createUrl() with the $hostInfo.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在$ UltraInfo之前添加由createUrl（）创建的URL 。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a convenient shortcut for:
trans-unit.target: 这种方法为以下方面提供了便捷的捷径。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the return URL from the session. It is usually used by the login action which may call this method to redirect the browser to where it goes after successful authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法从会话中读取返回的URL,通常由登录动作使用,它可以调用这个方法将浏览器重定向到认证成功后的地方。它通常被登录操作使用,登录操作可能会调用这个方法将浏览器重定向到认证成功后的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method renders the sort links.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可渲染排序链接。

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the exit() function by ensuring the application life cycle is completed before terminating the application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过确保在终止应用程序之前完成应用程序生命周期来替换 exit() 函数。

trans-unit.source: This method represents the happening of an event. It invokes all attached handlers for the event including class-level handlers.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法表示一个事件的发生,它调用事件的所有附加处理程序,包括类级处理程序。它调用事件的所有附加处理程序,包括类级处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This method requires that the primary key value is not null.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求主键值不为 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a stream resource that can be used with all file functions in PHP, which deal with reading files. The contents of the file are pulled out of MongoDB on the fly, so that the whole file does not have to be loaded into memory first.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法返回一个流资源,可以用于PHP中所有处理读取文件的文件函数。文件的内容是即时从MongoDB中提取出来的,所以整个文件不需要先加载到内存中。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the file's last modification time.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回文件的最后修改时间。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the named parameter value from $params. Null is returned if the value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从$ params返回命名参数值。如果该值不存在，则返回Null。

trans-unit.target: 本方法返回查询结果

trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该由具有实际邮件发送逻辑的子类来实现。

trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该在发送任何需要客户端凭证的HTTP请求之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method should be invoked by transport before sending a request. Do not call this method unless you know what you are doing.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该在发送请求之前由传输调用。除非你知道自己在做什么,否则不要调用本方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果$ useCustomStorage返回true，则应重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method treats the view file as a PHP script and includes the file. It extracts the given parameters and makes them available in the view file. The method captures the output of the included view file and returns it as a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将视图文件作为一个PHP脚本,并包含该文件。它提取给定的参数,并使它们在视图文件中可用。本方法捕获包含的视图文件的输出并以字符串形式返回。

trans-unit.source: This method validates whether the user selects an existing template and the template contains all required template files as specified in requiredTemplates().
trans-unit.target: 此方法验证用户是否选择了一个现有模板，并且该模板包含了requiredTemplates（）中指定的所有必需模板文件。

trans-unit.source: This method will adjust from() so that an already defined alias will be overwritten. If none was defined, from() will be populated with the given alias.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将调整from（），以便已定义的别名将被覆盖。如果未定义，则将使用给定的别名填充from（）。

trans-unit.source: This method will attempt to fetch the certificate value from $privateCertificateFile file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将尝试从$ privateCertificateFile文件中获取证书值。

trans-unit.source: This method will attempt to fetch the certificate value from $publicCertificateFile file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将尝试从$ publicCertificateFile文件中获取证书值。

trans-unit.source: This method will automatically call the all() method and return an array of ActiveRecord instances.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将自动调用 all() 方法并返回ActiveRecord实例的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method will automatically call the all() method and return an array of \yii\elasticsearch\ActiveRecordInterface instances.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将自动调用 all() 方法并返回\ yii \ elasticsearch \ ActiveRecordInterface实例的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method will be implicitly called by getModels() and getKeys() if it has not been called before.
trans-unit.target: 如果以前未调用过，则此方法将由getModels（）和getKeys（）隐式调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will be implicitly called by getModels() and getKeys() if it has not been called before.
trans-unit.target: 如果以前未调用过，则此方法将由getModels（）和getKeys（）隐式调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will call beforeValidate() and afterValidate() before and after the actual validation, respectively. If beforeValidate() returns false, the validation will be cancelled and afterValidate() will not be called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将分别在实际验证之前和之后调用beforeValidate（）和afterValidate（）。如果beforeValidate（）返回false，则验证将被取消并且afterValidate（）将不被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method will call insert() when isNewRecord is true, or update() when isNewRecord is false.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将调用插件（）时isNewRecord是真实的，或update（）方法时isNewRecord是假的。

trans-unit.source: This method will call insert() when $isNewRecord is true, or update() when $isNewRecord is false.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将调用插件（）时$ isNewRecord是 true ，或update（）方法时，$ isNewRecord是 false 。

trans-unit.source: This method will call yii\test\Fixture::load() for every fixture object.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将为每个灯具对象调用yii \ test \ Fixture :: load（）。

trans-unit.source: This method will call yii\test\Fixture::unload() for every fixture object.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将为每个灯具对象调用yii \ test \ Fixture :: unload（）。

trans-unit.source: This method will call buildRules() to parse the given rule declarations and then append or insert them to the existing $rules.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将调用buildRules（）解析给定的规则声明，然后将其追加或插入到现有的$ rules中。

trans-unit.source: This method will call one of the "as" methods available in this class to do the formatting. For type "xyz", the method "asXyz" will be used. For example, if the format is "html", then asHtml() will be used. Format names are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将调用此类中可用的“ as”方法之一来进行格式化。对于类型“ xyz”，将使用方法“ asXyz”。例如，如果格式为“ html”，则将使用asHtml（）。格式名称不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: This method will cause invocation of event handlers that are attached to the named event for the specified class and all its parent classes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将导致调用指定类及其所有父类的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This method will check if any attached behavior has the named method and will execute it if available.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法将检查是否有任何附加的行为具有命名的方法,并在可用时执行它。

trans-unit.source: This method will check if the command line option OPTION_APPCONFIG is specified. If so, the corresponding file will be loaded as the application configuration. Otherwise, the configuration provided as the parameter will be returned back.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将检查是否指定了命令行选项OPTION_APPCONFIG。如果是这样，相应的文件将作为应用程序配置被加载。否则，将返回作为参数提供的配置。

trans-unit.source: This method will check in the following order and act accordingly:

trans-unit.source: This method will check the existence of ImageMagick and GD extensions.
trans-unit.target: 本方法将检查ImageMagick和GD扩展的存在。

trans-unit.source: This method will check the requested fields against those declared in fields() and extraFields() to determine which fields can be returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将对照在fields（）和extraFields（）中声明的字段检查请求的字段，以确定可以返回哪些字段。

trans-unit.source: This method will clean up the existing batch query so that a new batch query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将清理现有的批处理查询,从而可以执行新的批处理查询。

trans-unit.source: This method will consider the current sorting status given by $attributeOrders. For example, if the current page already sorts the data by the specified attribute in ascending order, then the URL created will lead to a page that sorts the data by the specified attribute in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将考虑$ attributeOrders给定的当前排序状态。例如，如果当前页面已经按指定属性按升序对数据进行排序，则创建的URL将导致一个页面按指定属性按降序对数据进行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method will copy the specified file or directory to $basePath so that it can be accessed via the Web server.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会将指定的文件或目录复制到$ basePath，以便可以通过Web服务器对其进行访问。

trans-unit.source: This method will create a DynamicModel instance, populate it with the data to be validated, create the specified validation rules, and then validate the data using these rules.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将创建一个 DynamicModel 实例,用要验证的数据填充它,创建指定的验证规则,然后使用这些规则验证数据。

trans-unit.source: This method will create a new form field and returns its opening tag. You should call endField() afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将创建一个新的表单字段并返回其开始标记。之后应调用endField（）。

trans-unit.target: 此方法将基于给定的配置创建行为对象。之后，将通过调用yii \ base \ Behavior :: attach（）方法将行为对象附加到此组件。

trans-unit.target: 如果可用，此方法将显示缓存的内容。如果不是，它将开始缓存，并期望endCache（）调用结束缓存并将内容保存到缓存中。片段缓存的典型用法如下：

trans-unit.source: This method will filter the given messages with $levels and $categories. And if requested, it will also export the filtering result to specific medium (e.g. email).
trans-unit.target: 此方法将使用$ levels和$ categories过滤给定的消息。并且，如果需要，它将把过滤结果导出到特定的介质（例如电子邮件）。

trans-unit.source: This method will filter the given messages with $levels and $categories. And if requested, it will also export the filtering result to specific medium (e.g. email). Depending on the $includeContext attribute, a context message will be either created or ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将使用$ levels和$ categories过滤给定的消息。并且，如果需要，它将把过滤结果导出到特定的介质（例如电子邮件）。根据$ includeContext属性，将创建或忽略上下文消息。

trans-unit.source: This method will first authenticate the user by calling yii\web\IdentityInterface::findIdentityByAccessToken() with the provided access token. If successful, it will call login() to log in the authenticated user. If authentication fails or login() is unsuccessful, it will return null.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将首先通过使用提供的访问令牌调用yii \ web \ IdentityInterface :: findIdentityByAccessToken（）来对用户进行身份验证。如果成功，它将调用login（）登录经过身份验证的用户。如果身份验证失败或login（）不成功，它将返回null。

trans-unit.source: This method will first identify which fields to be included in the resulting array by calling resolveFields(). It will then turn the model into an array with these fields. If $recursive is true, any embedded objects will also be converted into arrays.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将首先通过调用resolveFields（）来识别要包含在结果数组中的字段。然后它将把模型变成具有这些字段的数组。如果 $recursive 为true，则任何嵌入的对象也将转换为数组。

trans-unit.source: This method will first look for the bundle in $bundles. If not found, it will treat $name as the class of the asset bundle and create a new instance of it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将首先在$ bundles中查找包。如果未找到，它将把 $name 视为资产捆绑包的类并创建它的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method will first try to determine the MIME type based on finfo_open. If the fileinfo extension is not installed, it will fall back to getMimeTypeByExtension() when $checkExtension is true.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将首先尝试基于finfo_open确定MIME类型。如果未安装 fileinfo 扩展名，则当 $checkExtension 为true 时，它将退回到getMimeTypeByExtension（）。

trans-unit.source: This method will log a message about the email being sent. If $useFileTransport is true, it will save the email as a file under $fileTransportPath. Otherwise, it will call sendMessage() to send the email to its recipient(s). Child classes should implement sendMessage() with the actual email sending logic.

trans-unit.target: 此方法通过将用户提供的CSRF令牌与存储在cookie或会话中的令牌进行比较，从而验证该令牌。该方法主要在yii \ web \ Controller :: beforeAction（）中调用。

trans-unit.source: This methods allows invoking a callback and let type hinted parameter names to be resolved as objects of the Container. It additionally allow calling function using named parameters.
trans-unit.target: 该方法允许调用一个回调,并让类型提示的参数名被解析为Container的对象。此外,它还允许使用命名参数调用函数。

trans-unit.source: This option allows to download files that are not under web folders, and even files that are otherwise protected (deny from all) like .htaccess.
trans-unit.target: 此选项允许下载不在Web文件夹下的文件，甚至下载受其他保护（禁止所有访问）的文件，例如 .htaccess 。

trans-unit.source: This option controls how the _source field is returned from the documents.
trans-unit.target: 此选项控制如何从文档返回 _source 字段。

trans-unit.source: This option controls how the _source field is returned from the documents. For example, ['id', 'name'] means that only the id and name field should be returned from _source. If not set, it means retrieving the full _source field unless fields() are specified. Setting this option to false will disable return of the _source field, this means that only the primaryKey of a record will be available in the result.
trans-unit.target: 此选项控制如何从文档返回 _source 字段。例如， ['id', 'name'] 表示应仅从 _source 返回 id 和 name 字段。如果未设置，则意味着检索完整的 _source 字段，除非指定了fields（）。将此选项设置为 false 将禁用 _source 字段的返回，这意味着在结果中仅记录的primaryKey可用。

trans-unit.source: This option will take effect only if groupBy() is set.
trans-unit.target: 仅当设置了groupBy（）时，此选项才会生效。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to customize the HTML which is used to generate the drop down caret symbol, which is displayed next to the button text to indicate the drop down functionality.

Defaults to null which means <span class="caret"></span> will be used. To disable the caret, set this property to be an empty string.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to map a controller ID to an arbitrary controller class. By default, Yii maps controller IDs to controller classes based on a convention (e.g. the ID post would be mapped to app\controllers\PostController). By configuring this property, you can break the convention for specific controllers. In the following example, account will be mapped to app\controllers\UserController, while article will be mapped to app\controllers\PostController.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许您将控制器ID映射到任意控制器类。默认情况下，Yii根据约定将控制器ID映射到控制器类（例如ID post 将映射到 app\controllers\PostController ）。通过配置此属性，可以打破特定控制器的约定。在以下示例中， account 将映射到 app\controllers\UserController ，而 article 将映射到 app\controllers\PostController 。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to the following values:
trans-unit.target: 此属性可设置为以下值:

trans-unit.source: This property defines the allowed request methods for each action.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个动作的允许请求方法。

trans-unit.source: This property defines the allowed request methods for each action. For each action that should only support limited set of request methods you add an entry with the action id as array key and an array of allowed methods (e.g. GET, HEAD, PUT) as the value. If an action is not listed all request methods are considered allowed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义了每个操作的允许请求方法。对于每个只支持有限的请求方法集的操作,你可以添加一个条目,用操作id作为数组键,用允许的方法数组(例如GET、HEAD、PUT)作为值。如果一个动作没有被列出,所有的请求方法都被认为是允许的。

trans-unit.source: This property is mainly provided to support conditional validation on the client-side. If this property is not set, this validator will be always applied on the client-side.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性主要是为了支持客户端的条件验证而提供的。如果该属性未设置,则该验证器将始终应用在客户端。

trans-unit.source: This property is mainly provided to support conditional validation on the server-side. If this property is not set, this validator will be always applied on the server-side.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性主要是为了支持服务器端的条件验证而提供的。如果不设置此属性,则此验证器将始终应用在服务器端。

trans-unit.source: This property is mainly used by getSchema() when fetching the database schema information. You normally do not need to set this property unless you want to use your own yii\db\Schema class to support DBMS that is not supported by Yii.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据库架构信息时，此属性主要由getSchema（）使用。除非您要使用自己的yii \ db \ Schema类来支持Yii不支持的DBMS，否则通常不需要设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is mainly used by getSchema() when fetching the database schema information. You normally do not need to set this property unless you want to use your own yii\sphinx\Schema class to support DBMS that is not supported by Yii.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据库架构信息时，此属性主要由getSchema（）使用。除非您要使用自己的yii \ sphinx \ Schema类来支持Yii不支持的DBMS，否则通常不需要设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is overwritten to be false so that this validator will be applied when the value being validated is empty.
trans-unit.target: 此属性被覆盖为false,因此当被验证的值为空时,将应用此验证器。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as an alternative way of setting the default time zone of the PHP runtime. By configuring this property, you are essentially calling the PHP function date_default_timezone_set(). For example:
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是设置PHP运行时默认时区的另一种方法。通过配置此属性，您实际上是在调用PHP函数date_default_timezone_set（）。例如：

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as an alternative way of setting the default time zone of the PHP runtime. By configuring this property, you are essentially calling the PHP function date_default_timezone_set(). For example:
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是设置PHP运行时默认时区的另一种方法。通过配置此属性，您实际上是在调用PHP函数date_default_timezone_set（）。例如：

trans-unit.source: This property is provided so that you can define aliases in terms of application configurations instead of by calling the Yii::setAlias() method.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是为了使您可以根据应用程序配置定义别名，而不是通过调用Yii :: setAlias（）方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to support fixing incorrect asset file paths in some asset bundles. When an asset bundle is registered with a view, each relative asset file in its css and js arrays will be examined against this map. If any of the keys is found to be the last part of an asset file (which is prefixed with yii\web\AssetBundle::$sourcePath if available), the corresponding value will replace the asset and be registered with the view. For example, an asset file my/path/to/jquery.js matches a key jquery.js.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性以支持修复某些资产捆绑中的错误资产文件路径。在视图中注册资产捆绑包时，将对照此地图检查其css和js数组中的每个相关资产文件。如果发现任何键是资产文件的最后一部分（前缀为yii \ web \ AssetBundle :: $ sourcePath（如果可用）），则对应的值将替换资产并在视图中注册。例如，资产文件 my/path/to/jquery.js 与键 jquery.js 匹配。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported by console applications only. It specifies whether the core commands included in the Yii release should be enabled. The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 仅控制台应用程序支持此属性。它指定是否应启用Yii版本中包含的核心命令。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported by Web applications only. It specifies a controller action which should handle all user requests. This is mainly used when the application is in maintenance mode and needs to handle all incoming requests via a single action.
trans-unit.target: 仅Web应用程序支持此属性。它指定一个控制器操作，该操作应处理所有用户请求。这主要在应用程序处于维护模式并且需要通过单个操作处理所有传入请求时使用。

trans-unit.source: This property may be modified on the fly by extensions who want to have their own message sources registered under their own namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性可以被想要在自己的命名空间下注册自己的消息源的扩展所修改。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies an array of globally accessible application parameters. Instead of using hardcoded numbers and strings everywhere in your code, it is a good practice to define them as application parameters in a single place and use the parameters in places where needed. For example, you may define the thumbnail image size as a parameter like the following:
trans-unit.target: 这个属性指定了一个全局访问的应用程序参数数组。与其在代码中到处使用硬编码的数字和字符串,不如在一个地方将它们定义为应用程序参数,并在需要的地方使用这些参数。例如,您可以将缩略图尺寸定义为如下的参数。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the route that an application should use when a request does not specify one. The route may consist of a child module ID, a controller ID, and/or an action ID. For example, help, post/create, or admin/post/create. If an action ID is not given, this property will take the default value specified in yii\base\Controller::$defaultAction.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定当请求未指定请求时，应用程序应使用的路由。路由可以包括子模块ID，控制器ID和/或动作ID。例如， help ， post/create 或 admin/post/create 。如果未提供操作ID，则此属性将采用yii \ base \ Controller :: $ defaultAction中指定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the modules that the application contains.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应用程序包含的模块。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the application name that may be displayed to end users. Unlike the id property, which should take a unique value, the value of this property is mainly for display purposes; it does not need to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定可能显示给最终用户的应用程序名称。与id属性应该具有唯一值不同，此属性的值主要用于显示目的；它不必是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the charset that the application uses. The default value is 'UTF-8', which should be kept as-is for most applications unless you are working with a legacy system that uses a lot of non-Unicode data.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应用程序使用的字符集。默认值为 'UTF-8' ，对于大多数应用程序，应保持原样，除非您使用的是使用大量非Unicode数据的旧系统。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the default namespace under which controller classes should be located. It defaults to app\controllers. If a controller ID is post, by convention the corresponding controller class name (without namespace) would be PostController, and the fully qualified class name would be app\controllers\PostController.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定控制器类应位于的默认名称空间。默认为 app\controllers 。如果控制器ID为 post ，则按照惯例，相应的控制器类名称（不带名称空间）将为 PostController ，完全限定的类名称将为 app\controllers\PostController 。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the language in which the application should display content to end users. The default value of this property is en, meaning English. You should configure this property if your application needs to support multiple languages.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应用程序应向最终用户显示内容的语言。此属性的默认值为 en ，表示英语。如果您的应用程序需要支持多种语言，则应配置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the language that the application code is written in. The default value is 'en-US', meaning English (United States). You should configure this property if the text content in your code is not in English.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应用程序代码的编写语言。默认值为 'en-US' ，表示英语（美国）。如果代码中的文本内容不是英语，则应配置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the list of extensions that are installed and used by the application. By default, it will take the array returned by the file @vendor/yiisoft/extensions.php. The extensions.php file is generated and maintained automatically when you use Composer to install extensions. So in most cases, you do not need to configure this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应用程序已安装和使用的扩展列表。默认情况下，它将采用文件 @vendor/yiisoft/extensions.php 返回的数组。该 extensions.php 文件生成，当您使用自动维护作曲安装扩展。因此，在大多数情况下，您无需配置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the name of the default layout that should be used when rendering a view. The default value is 'main', meaning the layout file main.php under the layout path should be used. If both of the layout path and the view path are taking the default values, the default layout file can be represented as the path alias @app/views/layouts/main.php.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定呈现视图时应使用的默认布局的名称。默认值为 'main' ，这意味着应使用布局路径下的布局文件 main.php 。如果布局路径和视图路径都采用默认值，则默认布局文件可以表示为路径别名 @app/views/layouts/main.php 。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the path where layout files should be looked for. The default value is the layouts sub-directory under the view path. If the view path is taking its default value, the default layout path can be represented as the path alias @app/views/layouts.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应在其中查找布局文件的路径。默认值为视图路径下的 layouts 子目录。如果视图路径采用其默认值，则默认布局路径可以表示为路径别名 @app/views/layouts 。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the path where temporary files, such as log files and cache files, can be generated. The default value is the directory represented by the alias @app/runtime.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定可以在其中生成临时文件（例如日志文件和缓存文件）的路径。默认值是别名 @app/runtime 表示的目录。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the root directory where view files are located. The default value is the directory represented by the alias @app/views. You may configure it as a directory or a path alias.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定视图文件所在的根目录。默认值是别名 @app/views 表示的目录。您可以将其配置为目录或路径别名。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the vendor directory managed by Composer. It contains all third party libraries used by your application, including the Yii framework. The default value is the directory represented by the alias @app/vendor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定由Composer管理的供应商目录。它包含您的应用程序使用的所有第三方库，包括Yii框架。默认值是别名 @app/vendor 表示的目录。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the version of the application. It defaults to '1.0'. You do not need to configure this property if none of your code is using it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定应用程序的版本。默认为 '1.0' 。如果您的代码均未使用此属性，则无需配置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the portion of the URL that is after the $hostInfo part. It includes the $queryString part if any.
trans-unit.target: 这是指URL中位于$ hostInfo部分之后的部分。它包括$ queryString部分（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the portion that is after the $hostInfo part. It includes the $queryString part if any. The implementation of this method referenced Zend_Controller_Request_Http in Zend Framework.
trans-unit.target: 这是指$ hostInfo部分之后的部分。它包括$ queryString部分（如果有）。该方法的实现在Zend Framework中引用了Zend_Controller_Request_Http。

trans-unit.source: This refers to the primary key value that is populated into the record after executing a find method (e.g. find(), findOne()). The value remains unchanged even if the primary key attribute is manually assigned with a different value.
trans-unit.target: 这指的是在执行查找方法(如find()、findOne())后,将主键值填充到记录中。即使主键属性被手动分配了不同的值,该值也不会改变。

trans-unit.source: This registers the necessary JavaScript code and renders the form open and close tags.
trans-unit.target: 这将注册必要的JavaScript代码并渲染表单的打开和关闭标签。

trans-unit.source: This registers the necessary JavaScript code.
trans-unit.target: 这将注册必要的JavaScript代码。

trans-unit.source: This renders the form open tag.
trans-unit.target: 这将渲染表单打开标签。

trans-unit.source: This repository is a read-only git subsplit of https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2. Please submit issue reports and pull requests to the main repository. For license information check the LICENSE-file.
trans-unit.target: 该存储库是https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2的只读git子分区。请提交问题报告，并将请求拉到主存储库。有关许可证信息，请检查LICENSE文件。

trans-unit.source: This script will be created as part of your application; you're free to edit it to suit your needs. The YII_DEBUG constant can be set to false if you do not want to see a stack trace on error, and/or if you want to improve the overall performance. In both basic and advanced application templates, the console application entry script has debugging enabled by default to provide a more developer-friendly environment.
trans-unit.target: 该脚本将作为您的应用程序的一部分创建；您可以根据自己的需要随意对其进行编辑。该 YII_DEBUG 常数可以设置为 false ，如果你不希望看到错误堆栈跟踪，和/或如果你想提高整体性能。在基本和高级应用程序模板中，控制台应用程序输入脚本均默认启用了调试功能，以提供对开发人员更友好的环境。

trans-unit.source: This section will describe how to use Gii to automatically generate code that implements some common Web site features. Using Gii to auto-generate code is simply a matter of entering the right information per the instructions shown on the Gii Web pages.
trans-unit.target: 本节将描述如何使用Gii自动生成实现一些常见网站功能的代码。使用Gii自动生成代码，只需按照Gii网页上显示的说明输入正确的信息即可。

trans-unit.source: This setter is provided in case a custom port is necessary for certain server configurations.
trans-unit.target: 这个设置器是在某些服务器配置需要自定义端口时提供的。

trans-unit.source: This setter is provided in case the entry script URL cannot be determined on certain Web servers.
trans-unit.target: 这个设置器是为了在某些Web服务器上无法确定入口脚本URL时提供的。

trans-unit.source: This setter is provided in case the schema and hostname cannot be determined on certain Web servers.
trans-unit.target: 这个设置器是在某些Web服务器上无法确定模式和主机名时提供的。

trans-unit.source: This should take the same value as when you generate the data using hashData(). It indicates whether the hash value in the data is in binary format. If false, it means the hash value consists of lowercase hex digits only. hex digits will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 该值应与使用hashData（）生成数据时的值相同。它指示数据中的哈希值是否为二进制格式。如果为false，则表示哈希值仅包含小写的十六进制数字。将生成十六进制数字。

trans-unit.source: This token is generated in a way to prevent BREACH attacks. It may be passed along via a hidden field of an HTML form or an HTTP header value to support CSRF validation.
trans-unit.target: 生成此令牌的方式可以防止BREACH攻击。它可以通过HTML表单的隐藏字段或HTTP标头值传递，以支持CSRF验证。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input is a valid uploaded file.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入的文件是否为有效的上传文件。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value can be found among the given list of values.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查是否能在给定的值列表中找到输入值。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value can be found in a table column represented by an Active Record attribute. You can use targetAttribute to specify the Active Record attribute and targetClass the corresponding Active Record class. If you do not specify them, they will take the values of the attribute and the model class being validated.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查是否可以在Active Record属性表示的表列中找到输入值。您可以使用 targetAttribute 指定的Active Record属性和 targetClass 相应的活动记录类。如果未指定它们，则它们将采用属性值和要验证的模型类。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a boolean.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为布尔值。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a date, time or datetime in a proper format. Optionally, it can convert the input value into a UNIX timestamp or other machine readable format and store it in an attribute specified via timestampAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是格式正确的日期，时间还是日期时间。（可选）它可以将输入值转换为UNIX时间戳或其他机器可读格式，并将其存储在通过timestampAttribute指定的属性中。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a double number. It is equivalent to the number validator.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为双精度数。它等效于数字验证器。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a number. It is equivalent to the double validator.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为数字。它等效于双重验证器。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为有效的URL。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a valid email address.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为有效的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is a valid string with certain length.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为一定长度的有效字符串。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is an integer.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否为整数。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is provided and not empty.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查是否提供了输入值,是否为空。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value is unique in a table column. It only works with Active Record model attributes. It supports validation against either a single column or multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值在表列中是否唯一。它仅适用于Active Record模型属性。它支持针对单列或多列的验证。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value matches the specified regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否符合指定的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: This validator checks if the input value represents a valid image file. It extends from the file validator and thus inherits all its properties. Besides, it supports the following additional properties specific for image validation purpose:
trans-unit.target: 该验证器检查输入值是否代表有效的图像文件。它从文件验证器扩展而来，因此继承了其所有属性。此外，它还支持以下特定于图像验证目的的其他属性：

trans-unit.source: This validator compares the specified input value with another one and make sure if their relationship is as specified by the operator property.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器将指定的输入值与另一个输入的值进行比较，并确保它们的关系是否符合 operator 属性指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This validator does not perform data validation. Instead, it is used to mark an attribute to be a safe attribute.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器不执行数据验证。相反，它用于将属性标记为安全属性。

trans-unit.source: This validator does not perform data validation. Instead, it will trim the surrounding white spaces around the input value. Note that if the input value is an array, it will be ignored by this validator.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器不执行数据验证。相反,它将修剪输入值周围的空白处。请注意,如果输入值是一个数组,它将被这个验证器忽略。

trans-unit.source: This validator does not validate data. Instead, it applies a filter on the input value and assigns it back to the attribute being validated.
trans-unit.target: 这个验证器并不验证数据,而是在输入值上应用一个过滤器,并将其分配回被验证的属性。相反,它在输入值上应用一个过滤器,并将其分配回被验证的属性。

trans-unit.source: This validator does not validate data. Instead, it assigns a default value to the attributes being validated if the attributes are empty.
trans-unit.target: 这个验证器并不验证数据,而是在属性为空的情况下给被验证的属性分配一个默认值。相反,如果属性为空,它会给被验证的属性分配一个默认值。

trans-unit.source: This validator is often used to verify that a foreign key contains a value that can be found in the foreign table.
trans-unit.target: 这个验证器通常用于验证外键是否包含一个可以在外表中找到的值。

trans-unit.source: This validator is usually used together with yii\captcha\CaptchaAction and yii\captcha\Captcha to make sure an input is the same as the verification code displayed by CAPTCHA widget.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器通常与yii \ captcha \ CaptchaAction和yii \ captcha \ Captcha一起使用，以确保输入的内容与CAPTCHA小部件显示的验证码相同。

trans-unit.source: This validator may also serve as a filter, allowing conversion of Mongo ID value either to the plain string or to \MongoId instance. You can enable this feature via $forceFormat.
trans-unit.target: 该验证器还可以用作过滤器，允许将Mongo ID值转换为纯字符串或\ MongoId实例。您可以通过$ forceFormat启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: This validator only works with an array attribute. It validates if every element of the array can be successfully validated by a specified validation rule. In the above example, the categoryIDs attribute must take an array value and each array element will be validated by the integer validation rule.

trans-unit.source: To disable buffering and reduce client memory requirements, PDO connection property PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_USE_BUFFERED_QUERY must be set to false. However, until the whole dataset has been retrieved, no other query can be made through the same connection. This may prevent ActiveRecord from making a query to get the table schema when it needs to. If this is not a problem (the table schema is cached already), it is possible to switch the original connection into unbuffered mode, and then roll back when the batch query is done.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用缓冲并减少客户端内存需求，必须将PDO连接属性 PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_USE_BUFFERED_QUERY 设置为 false 。但是，在检索到整个数据集之前，无法通过同一连接进行其他查询。这可能会阻止 ActiveRecord 在需要时进行查询以获取表架构。如果这不是问题（表模式已被缓存），则可以将原始连接切换为非缓冲模式，然后在完成批查询后回滚。

trans-unit.source: Try not to register too many bootstrapping components. A bootstrapping component is needed only if it wants to participate the whole life cycle of requesting handling. For example, if a module needs to register additional URL parsing rules, it should be listed in the bootstrap property so that the new URL rules can take effect before they are used to resolve requests.
trans-unit.target: 尽量不要注册过多的引导程序组件。仅当引导组件想要参与请求处理的整个生命周期时，才需要引导组件。例如，如果模块需要注册其他URL解析规则，则应在bootstrap属性中列出该模块，以便新的URL规则在用于解析请求之前可以生效。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Web applications, RESTful APIs are usually stateless, which means sessions or cookies should not be used. Therefore, each request should come with some sort of authentication credentials because the user authentication status may not be maintained by sessions or cookies. A common practice is to send a secret access token with each request to authenticate the user. Since an access token can be used to uniquely identify and authenticate a user, API requests should always be sent via HTTPS to prevent man-in-the-middle (MitM) attacks.
trans-unit.target: 与Web应用程序不同，RESTful API通常是无状态的，这意味着不应使用会话或cookie。因此，每个请求都应该带有某种身份验证凭据，因为会话或cookie可能不会维护用户身份验证状态。一种常见的做法是在每个请求中发送一个秘密访问令牌以认证用户。由于访问令牌可用于唯一标识和认证用户，因此应始终通过HTTPS发送API请求，以防止中间人（MitM）攻击。

trans-unit.source: Unlike accessing a relation property, each time you perform a dynamic relational query via a relation method, a SQL statement will be executed, even if the same dynamic relational query was performed before.
trans-unit.target: 与访问关系属性不同,每次通过关系方法执行动态关系查询时,即使之前执行了相同的动态关系查询,也会执行一条SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the yii\caching\Cache, ArrayCache allows the expire parameter of set(), add(), multiSet() and multiAdd() to be a floating point number, so you may specify the time in milliseconds (e.g. 0.1 will be 100 milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 与yii \ caching \ Cache不同，ArrayCache允许set（），add（），multiSet（）和multiAdd（）的expire参数为浮点数，因此您可以指定时间（以毫秒为单位）（例如0.1将为100）毫秒）。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the yii\redis\Cache, redis Cache allows the expire parameter of set(), add(), mset() and madd() to be a floating point number, so you may specify the time in milliseconds (e.g. 0.1 will be 100 milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 与yii \ redis \ Cache不同，redis Cache允许set（），add（），mset（）和madd（）的expire参数为浮点数，因此您可以以毫秒为单位指定时间（例如0.1为100毫秒）。
